channel.title: Infections on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Infections on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: CDC slashed food safety surveillance, now tracks only 2 of 8 top infections
item.description: “If you want to make foodborne disease go away, then don’t look for foodborne disease.”

item.title: “It’s shocking”; Massive raw milk outbreak from 2023 finally reported
item.description: The outbreak occurred in 2023–2024, but little information had been shared about it.
